For a delicious homemade lasagna, start by preheating your oven to 375°F. In a large skillet, brown 1 pound of ground beef, then drain the fat. Add 1 jar of marinara sauce and simmer for 5 minutes. In a separate bowl, mix 15 ounces of ricotta cheese, 1 beaten egg, and 1/4 cup grated Parmesan. Layer the ingredients in a 13x9-inch baking dish, starting with sauce, then noodles, ricotta mixture, and mozzarella. Repeat the layers, finishing with mozzarella on top. Bake for 45 minutes or until bubbly and golden.
